subject: Re: All Ears & Speech Website updates
preview: Hi Abbie,   Confirming that we have updated the svg icons color.  Here's the link: https://allears.com.au/tinnitus/  Let me know if you need further assistance.

Hi Abbie,

Confirming that we have updated the svg icons color.

Here's the link:
https://allears.com.au/tinnitus/

Let me know if you need further assistance.

https://allears.com.au/tinnitus/

https://allears.com.au/tinnitus/

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Jaime Velasquez

full_threads.body:
Hi Abbie,

I've completed the updates, except for the icon colors. We’ll need to recreate them, so we’ll get back to you on Monday regarding that.

Here are the links:
https://allears.com.au/audiologist-adelaide/
https://allears.com.au/tinnitus/

Please let us know if you'd like any further changes.
@jaime done with the other task, i just need help in changing the color of the svg icons in this page - https://allears.com.au/tinnitus/

Hey!

Few other things I noticed that need changing if someone can please help me out 😊

I don't want any purple. These logos and the writing should be in our navy blue colour.



These 4 locations still come up if you click on Audiologist Adelaide, can you please change them to our two current sites like you did on the other page.



Kind regards,

Abbie Johnston

Lead Clinical Support Officer (she/her)

p 08 8120 2110 | f 08 8120 2111

e abbie@allearsandspeech.com.au

a 403 Goodwood Rd, Westbourne Park SA 5041

w allearsandspeech.com.au



Our team is committed to maintaining and promoting an inclusive and child safe environment. I live and work on Kaurna Country and pay my respect to Elders past and present.



Find us on Facebook | Website

full_threads.body:

Confirming we have now made the updates and they are ready for you to review. 

Here are the links: 
https://allears.com.au/
https://allears.com.au/hearing-tests-adelaide/

Please let us know if you would like any further changes.

Hi @rica done with the following updates

✅ Can you please take off these locations and only have Westbourne Park and Elizabeth Vale.


✅ I'd also like this image changed as there are some old photos on here. It should also only say 2 locations.
https://allears.com.au/hearing-tests-adelaide/

✅ Can you please change it to also have the Locations option and take you to that page.

(Time: 20mins)
@jaime need your assistance with this, thanks!

Hi Abbie,

Hope you are doing well. 

This is to notify you that we received your request and we are already working on it. 

We will get back to you tomorrow with the details.

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Rica Rosario Valencia

full_threads.body:
Hey,


I found some old information on our All Ears & Speech that I need your help fixing.


Our locations are correct when you click on 'Contact Us', but when I searched something else, it took me to this page with the incorrect address.


Here is what it should be.



Can you please take off these locations and only have Westbourne Park and Elizabeth Vale.



I'd also like this image changed as there are some old photos on here. It should also only say 2 locations.

Please use this image instead.





Anther thing, on our Little Allied Health website, when you hover over Contact Us, it has these options.



But on the All Ears & Speech website it only has this option.

Can you please change it to also have the Locations option and take you to that page.




Please let me know if you have any questions. You can also ring me on 8120 2110.


Kind regards,


Abbie Johnston
Lead Clinical Support Officer (she/her)


p 08 8120 2110 | f 08 8120 2111
e abbie@allearsandspeech.com.au
a 403 Goodwood Rd, Westbourne Park SA 5041
w allearsandspeech.com.au

Our team is committed to maintaining and promoting an inclusive and child safe environment. I live and work on Kaurna Country and pay my respect to Elders past and present.


Find us on Facebook | Website
